title: US appeals court blocks Biden-era student debt relief plan
shortDescription: The SAVE program was designed to provide more generous terms than past income-based repayment plans.

title: Federal judge blocks Trump’s removal of Democrat agency chair
shortDescription: A federal judge ordered the Democratic chair of Merit Systems Protection Board, who was fired by President Donald Trump, be temporarily reinstated.

title: Americans’ approval of Congress is at its highest since May 2021
shortDescription: The latest Gallup poll, conducted among 1,004 adults, found that Americans’ approval of Congress’ job performance this month is at 29%.

title: Trump says Ukraine 'should have never started' war
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested Ukraine "should have never started" the war in Ukraine.

title: Zelenskyy claps back at Trump: 'Lives in this disinformation space'
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said that Trump is trapped in a Russian “disinformation bubble" and argued Ukraine is not for sale.

title: President Trump and Elon Musk joint interview
shortDescription: Elon Musk described the federal workforce as an "unelected bureaucracy" during the interview on Fox News Channel.

title: Putin-Trump meeting possible this month, Kremlin says
shortDescription: Trump said Tuesday he would probably meet Putin this month and dismissed Ukraine's concern about being left out of U.S.-Russian talks in Saudi Arabia.

title: Barron Trump anointed as 'future of conservative movement'
shortDescription: Without uttering a word in public, President Donald Trump's 18-year-old son excites College Republicans.

title: Trump says he ordered termination of remaining Biden-era US attorneys
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said in a Truth Social post that he has ordered the removal of all remaining U.S. attorneys from the Biden administration.

title: Trump says auto tariffs likely to start at 25%
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's planning to enact auto tariffs in the "neighborhood of 25%" to encourage companies to shift production from overseas.

title: RFK Jr. promised to protect 9/11 responders; Trump, Musk cuts hit
shortDescription: Up to 20% of staff at the WTC Health Program were impacted by cuts of probationary workers and buyouts, U.S. senators said in a letter.

title: Trump team pushes Romania to lift restrictions on Andrew Tate: Reports
shortDescription: Trump aide Richard Grenell reportedly intervened on behalf of influencer Andrew Tate, who's accused of human trafficking and rape.

title: Trump, Musk give joint TV interview airing Tuesday night: How to watch
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Elon Musk are set to appear in an interview with Fox News host Sean Hannity on Tuesday night.

title: Trump's mass firings are illegal, not-performance based, lawyers say
shortDescription: The lawyers for fired federal workers say the Trump administration didn't follow federal law in terminating probationary employees.

title: Who's leading DOGE? Not Elon Musk, the White House says
shortDescription: Even though President Trump named Elon Musk the head of DOGE, the White House claims Musk is actually a White House senior advisor with no authority.
